name: test-post
post: <header class="post-header"> <img data:width="48" data:height="48" alt="Reid Burke's avatar" class="post-avatar" src="asset/img/common/reid-avatar.png" /> <h2 class="post-title">Photos from CSSConf and JSConf</h2> <p class="post-meta"> By <a class="post-author" href="#">Reid Burke</a> under <a class="post-category" href="#">Uncategorized</a> </p> </header> <div class="post-description"> <div class="post-images pure-g"> <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-2"> <a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/uberlife/8915936174/"> <img alt="Photo of someone working poolside at a resort" class="pure-img-responsive" src="http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7448/8915936174_8d54ec76c6.jpg" /> </a> <div class="post-image-meta"> <h3>CSSConf Photos</h3> </div> </div> <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-2"> <a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/uberlife/8907351301/"> <img alt="Photo of the sunset on the beach" class="pure-img-responsive" src="http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7382/8907351301_bd7460cffb.jpg" /> </a> <div class="post-image-meta"> <h3>JSConf Photos</h3> </div> </div> </div> </div>
